content.text: Pretty good so far! I got to sleep in a little bit, and then I went for a run.
That sounds nice. I'm just waking up now. I have to get ready for work.
Oh no! What do you do for work?
I'm a police officer in a suburb of Detroit.
That sounds like a tough job! I'm a stay-at-home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're doing okay.
I'm managing. I love spending time with my kids and my pets.
That's great! I love spending time with my family and friends too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love listening to music, watching movies, and playing video games.
That sounds like fun! I love watching movies and playing video games too.
I love the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
That's one of my favorites too!
That's a great game! I've played it a few times.
